headline.main: Cops: Man Threw Gas on Wife and Set Her on Fire, Killing Her
headline.print_headline: Cops: Man Threw Gas on Wife and Set Her on Fire, Killing Her

lead_paragraph: Authorities in New York say a man threw gasoline on his wife and set her on fire during an argument, killing her.
snippet: Authorities in New York say a man threw gasoline on his wife and set her on fire during an argument, killing her....
